trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetComInterfaceForObject(System.Object,System.Type,System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomQueryInterfaceMode)"></xref> method's [IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144867) calls can use the <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ICustomQueryInterface"></xref> interface.
[IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144867) method calls can use the <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ICustomQueryInterface"></xref> interface.

When you use this value, the <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetComInterfaceForObject(System.Object,System.Type,System.Runtime.InteropServices.CustomQueryInterfaceMode)"></xref> method overload functions like the <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.GetComInterfaceForObject(System.Object,System.Type)"></xref> overload.
[IUnknown::QueryInterface](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=144867) method calls should ignore the <xref href="System.Runtime.InteropServices.ICustomQueryInterface"></xref> interface.
